ARK Solutions is hiring Senior US Recruiters !!
Benefits - Both side cabs + Free meal + Incentives
Interested folks can share updated profiles at anshita@arksolutionsinc.com or reach me out on 9599002624.
e-solutions INC is hiring for US IT staffing Professionals!!!
Candidates having minimum 0.6 Months of experience in US Staffing are eligible to apply
Should be comfortable to work on W2, Full Time, C2C
Eteam is looking for technical recruiter/Sr.technical recruiter ,Recruiting Manager, Service Delivery Processional for US Staffing.
Experience: 6 months to 4 yrs or more
interested candidates can share their resume at anjalisharma@eteaminc.com or call at 8130390370

•	Gather the requirements from the business team and interacting with delivery managers and Sr. Managers in a timely manner.•	Understanding the client requirements, coordinating for short listing and screening including preliminary interview of the candidates.•	Handled all the IT Technologies involving combination of complex skill sets and rare technologies.•	Involved in full cycle Recruitment involving sourcing, identifying, and interviewing, screening and placing personnel in quick turnaround time in contract, contract with hire and permanent Dealing with consultants on H1B, GC and CITIZEN, etc. Negotiating the rates/salary on Contract, Contract to hire basis and perm roles.•	Source resumes from job portals like Monster, Dice, and career builder and from professional networking sites like LinkedIn.•	Successful in identifying and closing niche IT candidates.•	Develop and Execute unique strategies to find exceptional candidates. •	Work with Account Managers on target skill sets to assess clients' staffing requirements.•	Identify, select, recruit and place the best candidates for the client.•	Build relationship with Hiring Managers and Candidates from initial contact through closing.•	Keeping track of responses & Short-listing Profiles.•	Oversee completion of necessary pre-employment processes including reference checks and negotiating wages
Technical Recruiter and Bench Sales Recuriter

•	Provide flexible and permanent staffing solutions and career management for small, mid-size, and large IT, Non-IT, Financial, Manufacturing and Banking and other industry clients.•	Work on direct client requirements.•	Perform Full Life Cycle IT Recruiting: Source, Interview, Qualify, Negotiate and Close candidates.•	Source resumes from job portals like Monster, Dice, Career Builder, Ladder and from professional networking sites like LinkedIn.•	Provide candidates matching specific client needs.•	Establish long lasting relationships with quality technical candidates through consistent contact.•	Successful in identifying and closing niche IT candidates.•	Develop and Execute unique strategies to find exceptional candidates.

Android Attendance Application.The main aim of this project was making an android application through which we can reduce the usage of paper, by taking attendance through smart phones. Through smartphone one can easily take attendance and that attendance is automatically save to the database. The database used in this application is SQLite.Music Player Android Application.The aim of the project was to develop an ANDROID APPLICATION using ECLIPSE IDE.The purpose of the application is to provide the functionality of Accessing the media files from the phone storage, display them in the form of list and play the media file selected by the user.E-Voting Android Application.The main aim of the project was making an android application through which everyone can vote at the move. The purpose of the application is to register the voter and provide a unique id after which the user can vote very easily according to his choice.
